content.sql:
WITH BASE AS ( SELECT dict.DICT_ITEM_ID AS typeId, dict.ITEM_NAME AS typeName
,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dds.BILL_DATE,23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,-12,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.PROD_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END ) AS LY_9 ,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dds.BILL_DATE,23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,0, '$Year$'+'-09-01'),23),0,8) THEN dds.PROD_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END ) AS TY_9
,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dds.BILL_DATE,23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,-11,'$Year$'+'-09-01'),23),0,8) THEN dds.PROD_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END ) AS LY_10 ,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dds.BILL_DATE,23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,1,'$Year$'+'-09-01'),23),0,8) THEN dds.PROD_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END ) AS TY_10
,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dds.BILL_DATE,23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,-10,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.PROD_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END ) AS LY_11 ,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dds.BILL_DATE,23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,2,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.PROD_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END ) AS TY_11
,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dds.BILL_DATE,23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,-9,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.PROD_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END ) AS LY_12 ,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dds.BILL_DATE,23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,3,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.PROD_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END ) AS TY_12
,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dds.BILL_DATE,23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,-8,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.PROD_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END ) AS LY_1 ,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dds.BILL_DATE,23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,4,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.PROD_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END ) AS TY_1
,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dds.BILL_DATE,23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,-7,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.PROD_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END ) AS LY_2 ,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dds.BILL_DATE,23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,5,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.PROD_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END ) AS TY_2
,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dds.BILL_DATE,23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,-6,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.PROD_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END ) AS LY_3 ,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dds.BILL_DATE,23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,6,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.PROD_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END ) AS TY_3
,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dds.BILL_DATE,23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,-5,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.PROD_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END ) AS LY_4 ,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dds.BILL_DATE,23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,7,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.PROD_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END ) AS TY_4
,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dds.BILL_DATE,23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,-4,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.PROD_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END ) AS LY_5 ,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dds.BILL_DATE,23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,8,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.PROD_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END ) AS TY_5
,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dds.BILL_DATE,23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,-3,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.PROD_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END ) AS LY_6 ,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dds.BILL_DATE,23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,9,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.PROD_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END ) AS TY_6
,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dds.BILL_DATE,23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,-2,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.PROD_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END ) AS LY_7 ,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dds.BILL_DATE,23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,10,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.PROD_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END ) AS TY_7
,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dds.BILL_DATE,23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,-1,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.PROD_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END ) AS LY_8 ,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dds.BILL_DATE,23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,11,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.PROD_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END ) AS TY_8
FROM DMS_DATA_SALE dds INNER JOIN DMS_PROD_MAPPING dpm ON dds.PROD_CODE = dpm.DIST_PROD_CODE AND dds.CLIENT_ID = dpm.CLIENT_ID AND dds.PROD_UNIT=dpm.DIST_PROD_UNIT AND dds.PROD_NAME=dpm.DIST_PROD_NAME INNER JOIN MDM_PRODUCT mp ON mp.PROD_CODE = dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE INNER JOIN DMS_STORE_MAPPING dsm ON dds.STORE_CODE = dsm.DIST_STORE_CODE AND dds.CLIENT_ID=dsm.CLIENT_ID INNER JOIN MDM_STORE ms ON ms.STORE_CODE = dsm.target_store_code AND ms.NATURE_ID IS NOT NULL LEFT JOIN BASE_DICT_ITEM as dict on ms.NATURE_ID = dict.DICT_ITEM_ID AND dict.DICT_ID = 'storeNature'
LEFT JOIN DMS_CLIENT dc ON dds.CLIENT_ID = dc.CLIENT_ID LEFT JOIN MDM_DISTRIBUTOR md ON md.DIST_ID = dc.DIST_ID AND ms.DIST_ID=md.DIST_ID LEFT JOIN BASE_ORG bo ON bo.ORG_ID=md.ORG_ID
WHERE dds.BILL_DATE >= convert(VARCHAR,dateadd(mm,-12,'$Year$'+'-09-01 00:00:00'),120) and dds.BILL_DATE <= convert(VARCHAR,dateadd(mm,12,'$Year$'+'-08-31 23:59:59'),120) and dds.state='1' $channelId$ $typeId$ $bannerId$ $orgId$ $distId$ $simsOrgId$ $storeName$ $brandId$ $prodCode$ $orgSubCode$ and mp.PROD_CODE not in ('zengpin','qita','tingchan') GROUP BY dict.DICT_ITEM_ID, dict.ITEM_NAME )
--创建临时表 SELECT * INTO #TEMP_REPORT_TABLE FROM base
--从临时表中查询数据 --汇总 SELECT '0' as parentId, 'Total' as selfId, 'Grand' as a, '' as d
,CAST(sum(LY_9) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_9, CAST(sum(TY_9) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_9 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_9) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_9) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_9) - sum(LY_9))/sum(LY_9)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r1 ,CAST(sum(LY_10) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_10, CAST(sum(TY_10) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_10 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_10) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_10) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_10) - sum(LY_10))/sum(LY_10)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r2 ,CAST(sum(LY_11) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_11, CAST(sum(TY_11) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_11 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_11) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_11) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_11) - sum(LY_11))/sum(LY_11)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r3 ,CAST(sum(LY_12) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_12, CAST(sum(TY_12) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_12 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_12) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_12) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_12) - sum(LY_12))/sum(LY_12)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r4 ,CAST(sum(LY_1) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_1, CAST(sum(TY_1) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_1 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_1) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_1) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_1) - sum(LY_1))/sum(LY_1)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r5 ,CAST(sum(LY_2) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_2, CAST(sum(TY_2) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_2 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_2) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_2) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_2) - sum(LY_2))/sum(LY_2)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r6 ,CAST(sum(LY_3) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_3, CAST(sum(TY_3) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_3 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_3) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_3) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_3) - sum(LY_3))/sum(LY_3)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r7 ,CAST(sum(LY_4) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_4, CAST(sum(TY_4) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_4 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_4) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_4) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_4) - sum(LY_4))/sum(LY_4)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r8 ,CAST(sum(LY_5) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_5, CAST(sum(TY_5) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_5 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_5) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_5) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_5) - sum(LY_5))/sum(LY_5)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r9 ,CAST(sum(LY_6) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_6, CAST(sum(TY_6) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_6 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_6) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_6) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_6) - sum(LY_6))/sum(LY_6)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r10 ,CAST(sum(LY_7) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_7, CAST(sum(TY_7) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_7 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_7) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_7) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_7) - sum(LY_7))/sum(LY_7)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r11 ,CAST(sum(LY_8) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_8, CAST(sum(TY_8) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_8 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_8) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_8) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_8) - sum(LY_8))/sum(LY_8)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r12
,CAST(sum(LY_9 + LY_10 + LY_11 + LY_12 + LY_1 + LY_2 + LY_3 + LY_4 + LY_5 + LY_6 + LY_7 + LY_8) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY ,CAST(sum(TY_9 + TY_10 + TY_11 + TY_12 + TY_1 + TY_2 + TY_3 + TY_4 + TY_5 + TY_6 + TY_7 + TY_8) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY
,CASE WHEN sum(TY_9 + TY_10 + TY_11 + TY_12 + TY_1 + TY_2 + TY_3 + TY_4 + TY_5 + TY_6 + TY_7 + TY_8) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_9 + LY_10 + LY_11 + LY_12 + LY_1 + LY_2 + LY_3 + LY_4 + LY_5 + LY_6 + LY_7 + LY_8) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_9 + TY_10 + TY_11 + TY_12 + TY_1 + TY_2 + TY_3 + TY_4 + TY_5 + TY_6 + TY_7 + TY_8) - sum(LY_9 + LY_10 + LY_11 + LY_12 + LY_1 + LY_2 + LY_3 + LY_4 + LY_5 + LY_6 + LY_7 + LY_8))/ sum(LY_9 + LY_10 + LY_11 + LY_12 + LY_1 + LY_2 + LY_3 + LY_4 + LY_5 + LY_6 + LY_7 + LY_8)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r13 ,'100%' as r14
FROM #TEMP_REPORT_TABLE
UNION ALL
--门店组织 SELECT 'Total' as parentId, CAST(typeId AS VARCHAR) as selfId, 'Grand' as a, typeName as d
,CAST(sum(LY_9) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_9, CAST(sum(TY_9) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_9 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_9) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_9) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_9) - sum(LY_9))/sum(LY_9)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r1 ,CAST(sum(LY_10) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_10, CAST(sum(TY_10) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_10 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_10) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_10) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_10) - sum(LY_10))/sum(LY_10)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r2 ,CAST(sum(LY_11) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_11, CAST(sum(TY_11) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_11 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_11) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_11) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_11) - sum(LY_11))/sum(LY_11)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r3 ,CAST(sum(LY_12) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_12, CAST(sum(TY_12) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_12 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_12) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_12) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_12) - sum(LY_12))/sum(LY_12)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r4 ,CAST(sum(LY_1) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_1, CAST(sum(TY_1) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_1 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_1) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_1) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_1) - sum(LY_1))/sum(LY_1)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r5 ,CAST(sum(LY_2) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_2, CAST(sum(TY_2) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_2 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_2) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_2) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_2) - sum(LY_2))/sum(LY_2)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r6 ,CAST(sum(LY_3) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_3, CAST(sum(TY_3) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_3 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_3) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_3) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_3) - sum(LY_3))/sum(LY_3)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r7 ,CAST(sum(LY_4) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_4, CAST(sum(TY_4) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_4 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_4) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_4) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_4) - sum(LY_4))/sum(LY_4)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r8 ,CAST(sum(LY_5) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_5, CAST(sum(TY_5) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_5 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_5) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_5) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_5) - sum(LY_5))/sum(LY_5)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r9 ,CAST(sum(LY_6) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_6, CAST(sum(TY_6) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_6 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_6) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_6) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_6) - sum(LY_6))/sum(LY_6)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r10 ,CAST(sum(LY_7) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_7, CAST(sum(TY_7) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_7 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_7) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_7) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_7) - sum(LY_7))/sum(LY_7)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r11 ,CAST(sum(LY_8) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_8, CAST(sum(TY_8) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_8 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_8) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_8) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_8) - sum(LY_8))/sum(LY_8)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r12
,CAST(sum(LY_9 + LY_10 + LY_11 + LY_12 + LY_1 + LY_2 + LY_3 + LY_4 + LY_5 + LY_6 + LY_7 + LY_8) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY ,CAST(sum(TY_9 + TY_10 + TY_11 + TY_12 + TY_1 + TY_2 + TY_3 + TY_4 + TY_5 + TY_6 + TY_7 + TY_8) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY
,CASE WHEN sum(TY_9 + TY_10 + TY_11 + TY_12 + TY_1 + TY_2 + TY_3 + TY_4 + TY_5 + TY_6 + TY_7 + TY_8) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_9 + LY_10 + LY_11 + LY_12 + LY_1 + LY_2 + LY_3 + LY_4 + LY_5 + LY_6 + LY_7 + LY_8) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_9 + TY_10 + TY_11 + TY_12 + TY_1 + TY_2 + TY_3 + TY_4 + TY_5 + TY_6 + TY_7 + TY_8) - sum(LY_9 + LY_10 + LY_11 + LY_12 + LY_1 + LY_2 + LY_3 + LY_4 + LY_5 + LY_6 + LY_7 + LY_8))/ sum(LY_9 + LY_10 + LY_11 + LY_12 + LY_1 + LY_2 + LY_3 + LY_4 + LY_5 + LY_6 + LY_7 + LY_8)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r12
,CASE WHEN sum(TY_9 + TY_10 + TY_11 + TY_12 + TY_1 + TY_2 + TY_3 + TY_4 + TY_5 + TY_6 + TY_7 + TY_8) =0 THEN '0%' ELSE CASE WHEN (SELECT sum(TY_9 + TY_10 + TY_11 + TY_12 + TY_1 + TY_2 + TY_3 + TY_4 + TY_5 + TY_6 + TY_7 + TY_8) FROM #TEMP_REPORT_TABLE) =0 THEN '100%' ELSE cast(cast(sum(TY_9 + TY_10 + TY_11 + TY_12 + TY_1 + TY_2 + TY_3 + TY_4 + TY_5 + TY_6 + TY_7 + TY_8)/(SELECT sum(TY_9 + TY_10 + TY_11 + TY_12 + TY_1 + TY_2 + TY_3 + TY_4 + TY_5 + TY_6 + TY_7 + TY_8) FROM #TEMP_REPORT_TABLE)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r14
FROM #TEMP_REPORT_TABLE AS base GROUP BY typeId,typeName
--删除临时表 IF object_id('tempdb..#TEMP_REPORT_TABLE') IS NOT NULL BEGIN DROP TABLE #TEMP_REPORT_TABLE END
